title: CMS proposes home health payment model
description: CMS proposed home health payment model which alarmed providers. Read this article to find out if this is a good idea.

title: Physicians Unqualified for Advanced APMs Placed Into MIPS
description: Physicians not meeting the qualification standards for the advanced APM track of MACRA's Quality Payment Program will be forced into participating in MIPS.

description: Specialty practices are increasing their knowledge on MACRA but are they prepared to fulfill the requirements? Click here to learn more.

title: FDA approves Novartis' 'breakthrough' leukemia drug but there's a catch
description: The FDA approved Novartis' revolutionary CAR-T cell leukemia therapy at the cost of $475,000 per treatment, according to STAT. Learn more here.

description: More than a decade of rising awareness about the need for emergency preparedness, which began in southeast Texas after Tropical Storm Allison in 2001, appears to have paid off.
